entry.title: New paper out today on purifying selection of mtDNA

link.title: New paper out today on purifying selection of mtDNA

entry.content: Our work resolving purifying selection of pathogenic mtDNA in specific immune cells goes live today in Nature Genetics! Check out Caleb’s tweetorial here and a News and Views piece summarizing this work from colleagues at the Wellcome Centre for Mitochondrial Research.

entry.title: Emerging Leader in Computational Oncology

entry.title: New preprint on synonymous mtDNA variation

link.title: New preprint on synonymous mtDNA variation

entry.content: A new preprint outlining a potential role for synonymous variation in the mitochondrial genome just dropped on bioRxiv! In brief, we provide new lines of evidence that synonymous variation in the mitochondrial genome may have a functional role due ot the limited tRNA pool requiring wobble-dependent translation. Check out a digest of the work in Caleb’s twitter thread!
